name: download_objects_brick
title: Download Objects
description: This app is designed to automate workflows where you find yourself downloading from many sources. Download Objects gathers a list of all objects associated with your project and exports them to middleware for processing and updating.

parameters.name: download_objects_type
parameters.description: Can contain values 'atribute', 'metric', 'fact', 'all'. By specifying you can constrain the type of objects being exported.

parameters.name: download_objects_output_file
parameters.description: Path to file where to store the results
